about_the_game:
In They Follow You, you must use a hivemind connected to you and overpopulated, simplified humans known as "Simples", and cause them to fall into the endless void of space by invading their lairs, which you find by exploring the post-apocalyptic earth.

Here are some features and things you can do in this game!

Fly around the different parts of Earth in your ship equipped with a light and beam, and explore to find secrets and lairs hidden throughout them

Play through the game's main story by invading the major lairs located in each different part of Earth and defeat them all

Re-play the game and figure out not only different ways to take out simples, but also find new secrets in the overworld

See how fast you can beat each lair/speedrun the game

And much more!

short_description: Use a ship to explore and a hive-mind to take out enemies. A post-apocalyptic, adventure horror game, you must explore a ruined earth with your ship (equipped with a beam and light) and find lairs to take out simplified humans known as Simples.
